about_the_game:
Still be a Human is an action roguelike with an emphasis on building artifact combinations. By choosing one of the characters, you descend from the top of the Tower of Shadows, on your way you will meet many enemies, the unique abilities of each of the heroes will help to fight them, and by placing the found artifacts in the abilities you will not leave a chance for the Cult of Shadows.

In early access version:

  • 3 characters - Warmaster, Ink Slayer and Mage
  • 30 Weapons - 10 for each hero
  • 25 Artifacts - each with its own unique property, from ball lightnings to black holes
  • 6 Stones of Characteristics - randomly obtained stones that improve your character's stats
  • 3 Locations - including Enemies, Bosses and traps
  • 45 - improvements to your characters' abilities

short_description: SBAH is an Roguelike Action in which you have to descend from the top of the Tower of Shadows, a cult who sacrificed their lives to gain immortality in the form of a shadow. Combine found artifacts by placing them in abilities and find out can you Still be a Human.
